hero.home: AI at the service of your business.
hero.description: KEEPIA revolutionizes business process management through artificial intelligence. We automate your repetitive tasks to free up your teams' time and optimize your operations.

contact.name: Name
contact.success: Thank you for contacting KEEPIA! We will get back to you soon.
contact.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.text: By accessing or using KEEPIA's services, you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

sections.title: 2. Services
sections.text: KEEPIA provides artificial intelligence and automation services for businesses. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any service at any time without notice.

sections.title: 3. User Responsibilities
sections.text: You agree to use our services legally and not to misuse, reverse engineer, or attempt to disrupt our platform or services.

sections.title: 4. Intellectual Property
sections.text: All content, trademarks, and materials on KEEPIA are the property of their respective owners. You may not use, copy, or distribute any content without permission.

sections.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
sections.text: KEEPIA is not responsible for any damages or losses resulting from the use of our services. All services are provided 'as is' without any warranty.

sections.title: 6. Changes to Terms
sections.text: We may update these terms of use at any time. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

sections.title: 7. Contact
sections.text: For any questions regarding these terms, contact us via the Contact page.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.text: KEEPIA is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

sections.title: 2. Information Collected
sections.text: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and any information provided through our contact forms. We also collect usage data via cookies and analytics tools.

sections.title: 3. Use of Information
sections.text: Your information is used to provide and improve our services, respond to requests, and ensure the security of our platform. We do not sell your data to third parties.

sections.title: 4. Cookies
sections.text: We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyze site usage. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser. See our cookies policy for more details.

sections.title: 5. Data Security
sections.text: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data. However, no internet transmission is 100% secure.

sections.title: 6. Your Rights
sections.text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, contact us.

sections.title: 7. Policy Changes
sections.text: We may update this privacy policy. Please review it regularly.

sections.title: 8. Contact
sections.text: For any questions about this policy, contact us via the Contact page.

sections.title: 1. What is a cookie?
sections.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to help sites function and collect information about your usage.

sections.title: 2. Use of Cookies
sections.text: KEEPIA uses cookies to improve your experience, analyze traffic, and remember your preferences. Some cookies are essential for the site to function.

sections.title: 3. Types of Cookies Used
sections.text: Essential cookies: necessary for the site to function. Analytics cookies: help us understand site usage. Preference cookies: remember your language and other settings.

sections.title: 4. Managing Cookies
sections.text: You can control and delete cookies via your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect your experience on our site.

sections.title: 5. Policy Changes
sections.text: We may update this cookies policy. Please review it regularly.

sections.title: 6. Contact
sections.text: For any questions about our use of cookies, contact us via the Contact page.

funFacts: We use AI to optimize our own processes!
Our automations are built to be simple to understand, even without being a developer.
80% of our automations save our clients at least 5 hours per week.

services.hero: AI solutions for every aspect of your business
services.description: From task automation to predictive analytics, KEEPIA covers all aspects of AI in business to ensure successful and measurable digital transformation.

list.title: AI Automation
list.desc: Automate your repetitive tasks. Document writing, email management, automated data processing.

list.title: Generative AI
list.desc: Create personalized content. Commercial offers, emails, AI-generated summaries.

list.title: Intelligent Chatbots
list.desc: Automatically answer questions. Customer support, FAQ, 24/7 employee assistance.

list.title: Data Analytics
list.desc: Optimize your processes. Predictive analytics, business insights, automated recommendations.

list.title: System Integration
list.desc: Connect your existing tools. APIs, webhooks, automatic data synchronization.

list.title: Security & Compliance
list.desc: Protect your data. Secure AI, GDPR compliance, complete audit trails.

why: Team of AI and automation experts
Custom solutions for SMEs and startups
Measurable ROI and fast implementation times

expertise.hero: AI expertise at the service of your growth
expertise.description: We master all AI technologies to offer you solutions adapted to your specific needs. Our goal: help you optimize your processes and accelerate your growth.

list.title: Automation & Workflows
list.desc: Automate your business processes with intelligent workflows and custom integrations.

list.title: Conversational AI
list.desc: Chatbots and virtual assistants to improve customer experience and internal efficiency.

list.title: Analytics & Business Intelligence
list.desc: Analyze your data to make better decisions with predictive insights.

list.title: AI Expert Team
list.desc: AI-specialized engineers and consultants, ready to adapt solutions to your needs.

list.title: Integration & APIs
list.desc: Connect your existing tools with our AI solutions via robust and secure APIs.

list.title: Project Support
list.desc: From design to production, we support you at every step of your transformation.

pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your goals and budget. All our packages include personalized support and dedicated assistance.

plans.name: Starter
plans.description: Ideal for discovering the power of automation without risk. We start with a small, high-impact process.
features: 1 targeted automation to save you time from the first week
Connection to your tools (form, email, spreadsheet, etc.)

plans.name: Growth
plans.description: Perfect for structuring your internal efficiency, saving hours of repetitive work, and streamlining information management.
features: Automate your repetitive tasks (HR, admin, reporting, onboarding...)
Integrate multiple tools (Notion, Slack, Google, Airtable, CRM...)
Custom rules to adapt automations to your workflow

plans.name: Autonomy
plans.description: For companies that want smooth, intelligent, almost invisible processes.
features: Deployment of advanced AI agents (internal assistants, scalable automations, etc.)
Custom architecture (APIs, business logic, complex scenarios)
Simplified documentation to easily track everything

homeCards.title: Automate your processes with AI
homeCards.text: KEEPIA supports SMEs and startups in their digital transformation. We adapt our AI solutions to each company to ensure efficiency, scalability and measurable ROI.

homeCards.title: AI solutions made for your needs
homeCards.text: Automation, generative AI, chatbots, analytics. We develop personalized solutions. Our goal: optimize your processes, reduce your costs, accelerate your growth.

homeCards.title: A team expert in AI and business
homeCards.text: Our consultants are trained in the latest AI technologies and understand business challenges. Concrete expertise to meet the challenges of digital transformation.
